snippet: After making an $80 million investment, China Media Capital and FountainVest Partners will help the unit, China Imax, complete a public offering.
abstract: Imax says it will sell fifth of its Chinese subsidiary to China Media Capital and private equity firm FountainVest Partners for $80 million.
lead_paragraph: After making an $80 million investment, China Media Capital and FountainVest Partners will help the unit, China Imax, complete a public offering.

headline.main: Imax Selling 20 Percent of Its China Business
headline.print_headline: Imax Selling 20% Stake in Its Chinese Business
